body:
The Windows error is probably because the component cannot create the file in whatever filepath you have provided. Back to DesignExplorer check the documentation here: [https://github.com/tt-acm/DesignExplorer/wiki/File-Preparation](https://github.com/tt-acm/DesignExplorer/wiki/File-Preparation)

The main difference is that DesignExplorer can visualize images and 3D geometries which Pollinator can't. If you want a sample file select "Save Selection To File"
